name: gse-wasm
description: WebAssembly efficient text segmentation; support english, chinese, japanese and other.
author: Xmader

scripts.build: cd wasm/ && GOARCH=wasm GOOS=js go build -o ../dist/gse.wasm .
scripts.build:lite: cd wasm/ && GOARCH=wasm GOOS=js go build --tags=lite -o ../dist/gse_lite.wasm .
scripts.build:full: cd wasm/ && GOARCH=wasm GOOS=js go build --tags=full -o ../dist/gse_full.wasm .
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:lite && npm run build:full
